mapper.select: SELECT pd.diagnosis_no, pd.disease_no, d.code, d.name FROM prescription_d pd, disease d WHERE pd.disease_no = d.no AND pd.diagnosis_no=#{orderNo}
SELECT pm.diagnosis_no, pm.medicine_no, m.code, m.name ,pm.presmedicine_count, pm.presmedicine_day FROM prescription_m pm, medicine m WHERE pm.medicine_no = m.no AND pm.diagnosis_no=#{orderNo}
SELECT pc.diagnosis_no, pc.clinic_no, c.kind, c.name FROM prescription_c pc, clinic c WHERE c.no = pc.clinic_no AND pc.diagnosis_no=#{orderNo}
